long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of websites like Clarity and Hotjar tracking your every click and scroll ? 

Protect your privacy with our easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to block intrusive trackers and analytics tools.
 
Features:

- Block Unwanted Trackers: Effortlessly prevent websites like Clarity, Hotjar, and others from collecting data on your interactions.
- Real-Time Blocking: Automatically block tracking requests as they occur, ensuring your browsing activity remains private.
- Customizable Blocking List: Add or remove domains to your blocked list directly from the extension's menu for tailored privacy control.
- Interactive Interface: A toggle switch to easily enable or disable blocking, view the number of requests blocked, and manage your blocked URLs.
- Take control of your online privacy and enjoy a cleaner, more secure browsing experience. 

Install the extension today and stop unwanted trackers in their tracks!
